str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Adverb from holos; completely, i.e. Altogether;, everywhere; not by any means.
Defect, loss, defeat, failure, shortcoming. From hettao; a deterioration, i.e. failure or loss.
Already; now at length, now after all this waiting. Apparently from e and de; even now.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
By no means, not at all. Intensive of ou; not indeed.
More, rather. Neuter of the comparative of the same as malista; more) or rather.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To act unjustly towards, injure, harm. From adikos; to be unjust, i.e. do wrong.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
By no means, not at all. Intensive of ou; not indeed.
More, rather. Neuter of the comparative of the same as malista; more) or rather.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To defraud, deprive of, despoil; mid: I endure deprivation; pass: To be bereft of. From apo and stereo; to despoil.
